description.english: Earn all other trophies.
description.french: Remportez tous les autres trophées.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei disponibili in Humanity.
description.japanese: HUMANITYのトロフィーを全て獲得した
description.spanish: Consigue todo los demás trofeos.

description.english: Lead the people into the light.
description.french: Guidez les gens vers la lumière.
description.italian: Guida gli Umani fino alla luce.
description.japanese: 人々を光に導いた
description.spanish: Guía a la gente hasta la luz.

description.english: Deliver a Goldy into the light.
description.french: Guidez un Goldy vers la lumière.
description.italian: Guida un Goldy fino alla luce.
description.japanese: GOLDYを光に導いた
description.spanish: Guía a un Goldy hasta la luz.

description.english: Complete the prologue.
description.french: Terminez le prologue.
description.italian: Completa il prologo.
description.japanese: プロローグをクリアした
description.spanish: Completa el prólogo.

description.english: Complete an optional trial.
description.french: Terminez une épreuve facultative.
description.italian: Completa una Sfida secondaria.
description.japanese: はじめてサイドステージをクリアした
description.spanish: Completa una prueba opcional.

description.english: Complete Sequence 1: Awakening.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 1 : Éveil.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 1: Risveglio.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 1: “覚醒” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 1: Despertar.

description.english: Complete Sequence 2: Choice.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 2 : Choix.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 2: Scelta.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 2: “選択” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 2: Elección.

description.english: Defeat the Blue Core.
description.french: Battez le Noyau bleu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Nucleo Blu.
description.japanese: “BLUE CORE” の試練をクリアした
description.spanish: Derrota al núcleo azul.

description.english: Complete Sequence 3: Fate.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 3 : Destin.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 3: Destino.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 3: “運命” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 3: Destino.

description.english: Complete Sequence 4: Competition
description.french: Terminez la séquence 4 : Compétition.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 4: Competizione.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 4: “葛藤” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 4: Competición.

description.english: Defeat the Green Core.
description.french: Battez le Noyau vert.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Nucleo Verde.
description.japanese: “GREEN CORE” の試練をクリアした
description.spanish: Derrota al núcleo verde.

description.english: Complete Sequence 5: War.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 5 : Guerre.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 5: Guerra.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 5: “戦争” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 5: Guerra.

description.english: Complete Sequence 6: Dependence.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 6 : Dépendance.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 6: Dipendenza.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 6: “追従” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 6: Dependencia.

description.english: Defeat the Yellow Core.
description.french: Battez le Noyau jaune.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Nucleo Giallo.
description.japanese: “YELLOW CORE” の試練をクリアした
description.spanish: Derrota al núcleo amarillo.

description.english: Complete Sequence 7: Civilization.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 7 : Civilisation.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 7: Civiltà.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 7: “文明” の実験場をクリアした
description.spanish: Completa la secuencia 7: Civilización.

description.english: Defeat the Red Core.
description.french: Battez le Noyau rouge.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Nucleo Rosso.
description.japanese: “RED CORE” の試練をクリアした
description.spanish: Derrota al núcleo rojo.

displayName.japanese: GOLDY コレクター・プロローグ

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in the Prologue.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy du prologue.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nel prologo.
description.japanese: プロローグのGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy del prólogo.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 1: Awakening.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 1 : Éveil.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 1: Erwachen.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 1: Risveglio.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 1: “覚醒” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 1: Despertar.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 2: Choice.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 2 : Choix.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 2: Entscheidung.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 2: Scelta.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 2: “選択” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 2: Elección.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 3: Fate.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 3 : Destin.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 3: Schicksal.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 3: Destino.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 3: “運命” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 3: Destino.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 4: Competition.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 4 : Compétition.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 4: Konkurrenz.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 4: Competizione.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 4: “葛藤” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 4: Competición.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 5: War.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 5 : Guerre.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 5: Krieg.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 5: Guerra.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 5: “戦争” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 5: Guerra.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 6: Dependence.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 6 : Dépendance.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 6: Abhängigkeit.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 6: Dipendenza.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 6: “追従” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la Secuencia 6: Dependencia.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy in Sequence 7: Civilization.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy de la séquence 7 : Civilisation.
description.german: Sammle sämtliche Goldys in Sequenz 7: Zivilisation.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy nella Sequenza 7: Civiltà.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 7: “文明” の実験場のGOLDYをすべて導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy de la secuencia 7: Civilización.

description.english: Collect all the Goldy.
description.french: Récupérez tous les Goldy.
description.italian: Conduci al traguardo tutti i Goldy.
description.japanese: すべてのGOLDYを導いた
description.spanish: Consigue a todos los Goldy.

description.english: Cause the people to take on a new form.
description.french: Donnez aux gens une nouvelle forme.
description.german: Lass die Menschen eine neue Gestalt annehmen.
description.italian: Fai assumere una forma diversa agli Umani.
description.japanese: 人々の形態に変化が訪れた
description.spanish: Haz que la gente cobre un nuevo aspecto.

description.english: Cause the people to take on a truly astonishing form.
description.french: Donnez aux gens une forme réellement époustouflante.
description.german: Lass die Menschen eine wahrhaft erstaunliche Gestalt annehmen.
description.italian: Fai assumere agli Umani una forma strabiliante.
description.japanese: 人々の形態に異形の変化が訪れた
description.spanish: Haz que la gente cobre un aspecto realmente asombroso.

description.english: Retry the same trial five times while keeping your placed commands.
description.french: Recommencez la même épreuve cinq fois en conservant les commandes placées.
description.german: Starte eine Prüfung fünfmal neu und behalte dabei deine platzierten Befehle bei.
description.italian: Prova la stessa Sfida cinque volte mantenendo i comandi posizionati.
description.japanese: 同じステージで5回以上 KEEP ITEM RETRYをした
description.spanish: Has reintentado la misma prueba cinco veces manteniendo las órdenes colocadas.

description.english: Get squished by a block.
description.french: Faites-vous écraser par un bloc.
description.italian: Fatti schiacciare da un blocco.
description.japanese: 犬がブロックに押しつぶされた
description.spanish: Haz que te aplaste un bloque.

description.english: Issue the people with firearms.
description.french: Dotez les gens d'armes à feu.
description.german: Rüste die Menschen mit Schusswaffen aus.
description.italian: Dota gli Umani di armi da fuoco.
description.japanese: はじめて人間がSHOOTを手にした
description.spanish: Dale armas de fuego a la gente.

description.english: Have a single human follow you using the FOLLOW command.
description.french: Faites qu'une seule personne vous suive en utilisant la commande SUIVRE.
description.german: Weise einen einzelnen Menschen mit dem Befehl FOLGEN dazu an, dir zu folgen.
description.italian: Fai in modo che un solo Umano ti segua usando il comando SEGUI.
description.japanese: FOLLOWを使って一人の人間としばらく行動を共にした
description.spanish: Haz que te siga un solo humano utilizando la orden SEGUIR.

description.english: Have 1,000 humans follow you at once using the FOLLOW command.
description.french: Faites que 1 000 humains vous suivent en utilisant la commande SUIVRE.
description.german: Weise 1000 Menschen gleichzeitig mit dem Befehl FOLGEN dazu an, dir zu folgen.
description.italian: Fai in modo che 1.000 Umani ti seguano usando il comando SEGUI.
description.japanese: FOLLOWを使って1000人の人間を引き連れた
description.spanish: Haz que te sigan 1000 humanos utilizando la orden SEGUIR.

description.english: Defeat 100,000 Others.
description.french: Battez 100 000 Autres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100.000 Altri.
description.japanese: OTHERSを100000人倒した
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 000 otros.

description.english: Lead 50,000 people into the light.
description.french: Guidez 50 000 personnes vers la lumière.
description.italian: Conduci 50.000 Umani fino alla luce.
description.japanese: 50000人の人間をゴールに導いた
description.spanish: Guía a 50 000 personas hacia la luz.

description.english: Cause 50,000 humans to perish.
description.french: Faites périr 50 000 humains.
description.italian: Provoca la morte di 50.000 Umani.
description.japanese: 50000人の人間が消滅した
description.spanish: Haz que 50 000 humanos perezcan.

description.english: Access the Archives.
description.french: Accédez aux Archives.
description.italian: Accedi all'Archivio.
description.japanese: THE ARCHIVEの像にアクセスした
description.spanish: Accede al archivo.

description.english: Visit the Archives and give the people a new model and skin.
description.french: Rendez-vous aux Archives et donnez aux gens un nouveau modèle et un nouveau skin.
description.german: Besuche das Archiv und gib den Menschen ein neues Modell und ein neues Skin.
description.italian: Visita l'Archivio e dai agli Umani una skin e un modello nuovi.
description.japanese: THE ARCHIVEで人間の形態とスキンを変化させた
description.spanish: Visita el archivo y dale a la gente un nuevo modelo y aspecto.

displayName.japanese: レコードウォッチャー

description.english: View all Stats.
description.french: Consultez toutes les Stats.
description.italian: Scopri tutte le statistiche.
description.japanese: 全てのSTATSを閲覧した
description.spanish: Consulta todas las estadísticas.

description.english: Complete Sequence 1: Trial 02-A THREE TOWERS with all Goldy, while using only two switches.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 1 : épreuve 02-A TROIS TOURS avec tous les Goldy, en utilisant seulement deux interrupteurs.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 02-A DREI TÜRME in Sequenz 1 mit sämtlichen Goldys ab und verwende dabei nur zwei Schalter.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 1: Sfida 02-A TRE TORRI conducendo al traguardo tutti i Goldy e usando solo due interruttori.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 1: TRIAL 02-A THREE TOWERSでスイッチを2つしか使わずに全GOLDYをゴールさせてクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 02-A LAS TRES TORRES de la secuencia 1 con todos los Goldy y utilizando solo dos interruptores.

description.english: Complete Sequence 2: Trial 04-A DROP BOX without a single person perishing.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 2 : épreuve 04-A STOP & GO sans qu'aucune personne ne périsse.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 04-A EINE VERFAHRENE KISTE in Sequenz 2 ab, ohne dass ein Mensch ums Leben kommt.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 2: Sfida 04-A BLOCCO DI PASSAGGIO senza che muoia nemmeno un Umano.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 2: TRIAL 04-A DROP BOXで人間を一人も消滅させずにクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 04-A BLOQUE SALVAVIDAS de la secuencia 2 sin que perezca ni una persona.

description.english: Complete Sequence 3: Trial 05-A MISSING LINK without using one of the branching commands.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 3 : épreuve 05-A BOUCHE-TROU sans utiliser de commande de division.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 05-A DAS FEHLENDE GLIED in Sequenz 3 ab, ohne einen Teilungsbefehl zu benutzen.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 3: 05-A UN BLOCCO PER DUE FALLE senza usare uno dei comandi di Diramazione.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 3: TRIAL 05-A MIND THE GAPでBRANCHを1つ残してクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 05-A EL ESLABÓN PERDIDO de la secuencia 3 sin utilizar una de las órdenes de ramificar.

description.english: Complete Sequence 4: Trial 08 THE LAST STRAW without a single person perishing.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 4 : épreuve 08 LA COUPE EST PLEINE sans qu'aucune personne ne périsse.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 08 GEGENOFFENSIVE in Sequenz 4 ab, ohne dass ein Mensch ums Leben kommt.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 4: Sfida 08 ALTRI ALL'ATTACCO senza che muoia nemmeno un Umano.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 4: TRIAL 08 AGAINST THE OTHERで人間を一人も消滅させずにクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 08 MASA ENFURECIDA de la secuencia 4 sin que perezca ni una persona.

description.english: Complete Sequence 5: Trial 04 HILL TO DIE ON after destroying all the Others' gates.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 5 : épreuve 04 COLLINE FATALE après avoir détruit tous les portails des Autres.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 04 GIPFEL DES TODES in Sequenz 5 ab, nachdem du sämtliche Tore der Anderen zerstört hast.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 5: Sfida 04 OLTRE LA COLLINA dopo aver distrutto tutti i varchi degli Altri.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 5: TRIAL 04 AIR SUPPORTでOTHERSのゲートを全て破壊してクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 04 COLINA MORTAL de la secuencia 5 después de destruir todas las puertas de los otros.

description.english: Lead every single person to the light in Sequence 6: Trial 03-B GRID RUNNER.
description.french: Guidez les gens vers la lumière dans la séquence 6 : épreuve 03-B QUADRILLAGE.
description.german: Führe in der Prüfung 03-B VORFAHRT ACHTEN in Sequenz 6 sämtliche Menschen zum Licht.
description.italian: Conduci tutti gli Umani fino alla luce nella Sequenza 6: Sfida 03-B DEDALO PERICOLOSO.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 6: TRIAL 03-B GRID RUNNERで全員をゴールに導いてクリア
description.spanish: Guía a todas las personas a la luz en la prueba 03-B DENTRO DEL LABERINTO de la secuencia 6.

description.english: Complete Sequence 7: Trial 08 CENTRAL PROCESSING without retrying and keeping your placed commands.
description.french: Terminez la séquence 7 : épreuve 08 UNITÉ CENTRALE sans réessayer et en conservant les commandes placées.
description.german: Schließe die Prüfung 08 RECHENZENTRUM in Sequenz 7 ab, ohne sie neu zu starten und dabei deine Befehle beizubehalten.
description.italian: Completa la Sequenza 7: Sfida 08 PROCESSORE CENTRALE senza riprovare mantenendo i comandi posizionati.
description.japanese: SEQUENCE 7: TRIAL 08 CENTRAL PROCESSINGをKEEP ITEM RETRYを使わずクリア
description.spanish: Supera la prueba 08 PROCESAMIENTO CENTRAL de la secuencia 7 sin reintentar manteniendo las órdenes colocadas.

description.english: Assemble the Seven Wonders of Humanity.
description.french: Rassemblez les Sept Merveilles de Humanity.
description.german: Sammle die Sieben Wunder der Menschheit.
description.italian: Completa le Sette Meraviglie degli Umani.
description.japanese: 7つの挑戦を全てクリアした
description.spanish: Consigue las siete maravillas de Humanity.
